title: TAPTAP Diaspora
text:
In the past two years, for several reasons, the tech area of TAPTAP networks / Sonatalocal.com has suffered some heavy attrition.

This Map tracks where all the engineers & designers who have left the company since 2013 are working by April 2015.

The raw data can be found here, so if you want to add any update, feel free to pull request a change :)

data.name: Automattic
data.desc: Automattic projects include WordPress.com, Jetpack, Gravatar, VaultPress, and Akismet.

data.name: Buguroo
data.desc: Bugiroo are a multinational manufacturer of security solutions in Cloud that works through the channel. They solve software security problems without needing to deploy programs on corporationâ€™s workstations, nor installing servers.

data.name: idealista
data.desc: idealista is a real estate website for renting, buying and selling houses and flats.

data.name: feverup
data.desc: Fever delivers a curated list of the most exciting events, tailored for you.

data.name: Vizzuality
data.desc: Vizzuality is dedicated in the designing and development of rich internet applications for biodiversity information.

data.name: fintonic.com
data.desc: Fintonic.com is a free online personal finance service provider offering users advice to make the most out of their income.

data.name: Ad Roll
data.desc: AdRoll is the top retargeting platform, making retargeting simple and profitable for companies and agencies of all sizes.

data.name: Tuenti
data.desc: Tuenti Technologies is a Spanish social networking site allowing users to send real-time messages.
